docs.snippet: The proceedings in Congress, yesterday, were of considerable interest. In the Senate a report was made by a majority of the Judiciary Committee in favor of the right of Messrs. BRIGHT and FITCH, of Indiana, to their seats. Mr. DOUGLAS introduced a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The proceedings in Congress, yesterday, were of considerable interest. In the Senate a report was made by a majority of the Judiciary Committee in favor of the right of Messrs. BRIGHT and FITCH, of Indiana, to their seats. Mr. DOUGLAS introduced a bill in reference to foreign aggressions. The fifteen million loan hill was debated at length.

headline.main: MEETING OF THE BOARD OF HEALTH.; THE DISTEMPER AMONG THE HOGS. New-Jersey Swill-Pork for the New-York Market.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board met yesterday at 3 P. 3., Mayor TIEMANN in the chair. Petitions from Drs. FRANCIS GRISOOM and others, were presented, setting forth the injury to the public health which would result from the continuance of the swill milk business, and asking that the Board would take speedy action for its suppression.

headline.main: MOVEMENTS AT THE NAVY YARD.; Uprear among the Lieutenants.

docs.abstract: Ordered to command of the arctic
docs.lead_paragraph: Agreeably to the orders from the Naval Department, the steamer Arctic was brought up on Sunday from Quarantine, where she has been stationed, under the charge of Lieut. DRAKE, as a guard-ship for the Susquthanna, and yesterday morning a large gaeg of men was set to work to get her in readiness for immediate service on the coast of Cuba.

headline.main: Murder and Suicide at GreeN Island, N. Y.--Incendiarisim at West Troy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A horrible tragedy was enacted at Green Island, a small village opposite this City, on Saturday evening; one of the most startling that has occurred in this vicinity for a long time. The following are the facts: Over a year since JOHN REED and CAROLINE M. HOGLE were married by Justice MONTGOMERY, of West Troy. They lived together at that place until last

docs.snippet: Hon. CHARLES SUMNER sailed again for Europe, in the Vanderbilt, on Saturday. The following letter, addressed to his constituents, explains the reasons of his departure:-- To the People of Massachusetts: Two years have now passed since, while in the...

headline.main: Senator Sumner's departure for Europe-- Letter to his Constituents.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hon. CHARLES SUMNER sailed again for Europe, in the Vanderbilt, on Saturday. The following letter, addressed to his constituents, explains the reasons of his departure:-- To the People of Massachusetts: Two years have now passed since, while in the enjoyment of perfect health, I was suddenly made an invalid.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; City Mortality. The Alleged Forgery on the Post-Office. City Items. Police Intelligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following is the weekly report of deaths in the City and County of New-York, from the 15th day of May to the 22d day of May, 1658: Men, 97 ; Women 80; Boys, 123; Girls, 102. Total, 402*. Adulis, 177; Children, 225; Males, 220; Females, 182; Colored persons, 6.

docs.snippet: The most piquant and readable volume that has been published during the present year is Trelawney's Recollections of the Last Days of Shelley and Byron, which has just been presented to American readers by TICKNOR  FIELDS, of Boston.
docs.lead_paragraph: The most piquant and readable volume that has been published during the present year is Trelawney's Recollections of the Last Days of Shelley and Byron, which has just been presented to American readers by TICKNOR FIELDS, of Boston.

docs.snippet: The Health Commissioners promise to enter upon the performance of a long-neglected duty. They have agreed with Mayor TIMES that the swill-milk nuisance must be abated.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Health Commissioners promise to enter upon the performance of a long-neglected duty. They have agreed with Mayor TIMES that the swill-milk nuisance must be abated.

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE NIAGARA'S MAILS.; ADDITIONAL NEWS FROM INDIA. A British Argument in favor of American Expansion.

docs.abstract: Russell's account of the Fall of Lucknow
docs.lead_paragraph: The mails by the Niagara from Boston, reached this City last evening. We obtain from our European files some additional intelligence of interest. The Times announces, an authority, that her majesty has intimated her intention of raising Sir COLIN CAMPELL to the peerage. The new title of Sir Colin is not given.
